argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ressply1.s | |- S = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | ressply1.h | |- H = ( R |`s T ) |
| 3 |  | ressply1.u | |- U = ( Poly1 ` H ) |
| 4 |  | ressply1.b | |- B = ( Base ` U ) |
| 5 |  | ressply1.2 | |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) |
| 6 |  | ressply1.p | |- P = ( S |`s B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( PwSer1 ` H ) = ( PwSer1 ` H ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( PwSer1 ` H ) ) = ( Base ` ( PwSer1 ` H ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` S ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 | #P_ressply1bas2 | |- ( ph -> B = ( ( Base ` ( PwSer1 ` H ) ) i^i ( Base ` S ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_inss2 | |- ( ( Base ` ( PwSer1 ` H ) ) i^i ( Base ` S ) ) C_ ( Base ` S ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl6eqss | |- ( ph -> B C_ ( Base ` S ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 9 | #P_ressbas2 | |- ( B C_ ( Base ` S ) -> B = ( Base ` P ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` P ) ) |
